name: NetGPS
description: Share your GPS location over TCP/IP to nearly any NMEA device or software. Use with popular marine charting programs with the comfort of your PC, or even to your own open-source Arduino or Raspberry hardware project**.  Advanced features you wont find anywhere else:   Nearly limitless simultaneous client support  Android service for background operation  Real-time satellite sky-view  Multiple positioning systems support (see list below)  NMEA 0183 v3.01 compliance  Adjustable sentence output rate  Interpreted and calculated dilution of precision  GNSS and Network location smart-fusion for even faster time to first fix  Multiple sentences support (see list below)  Course over ground calculated using time-filtered great-circle geometry  Gyro-stabilized compass headings  WMM-2015v2 latest magnetic variation model for accuracy   Supported Sentences:  Position & View: RMC, GGA, GSA, GSV  Heading: HDG, HDT  Atmospheric Pressure: MDA, MMB, XDR  Supported positioning systems:  GPS  WAAS / EGNOS / GAGAN/ MSAS / SDCM / SNAS / SACCSA  GLONASS  BeiDU and Compass  QZSS  Note not all features may be available depending on the hardware capabilities of the device running the app.  Location Access Permission: This app collects location data to enable sending your location over TCP even when the app is closed. A persistent notification is shown while the app is running to remind you the app is running in the background. You may stop this at any time from the main page of the app. We do not share your location data for advertising.  Trouble getting started? Watch our YouTube tutorials here. [https://goo.gl/JZULfP]  To be sure this app fits your needs, the app will let you use the main functionality of the app for 10 minutes at a time. You may restart the 10 minute trial as many times as you like - or purchase an in-app license to remove time-limits and unlock advanced settings.  Do you use this app at work or in the office? Contact us for information on white label, volume licensing and custom solutions.  *Brand names and trademarks are property of their respective owners. We are not affiliated nor endorsed by any holder mentioned. **Connecting to an Ardruino or Raspberry project does require a compatible network capability.  Pirated copies may contain malware, ads, viruses, or even generate bad location data. Dont risk your vessel, aircraft, or your personal safety.
